description: Application to clear condition 25 (Electric Vehicle Charging) of approved application DM2022/00267.
decision_conditions: Prior to the occupation of the development the details of the Electric Vehicle Charging(EVC) points shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority.The details shall include the location of any active EVC charging points and the details andpassive provision for all remaining parking spaces.Reason: To improve air quality and provide ECV infrastructure in accordance with policies 34and 37 of the Sutton Local Plan.
